pages.text: $(o)Long ago in the depths of the Nether, many $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blazes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfires$(/l) fought in the $(l)Burning Coliseum$() to try to obtain the immortality.$(br2)$(o)It is rumored that to this day the champion is still waiting latently for a formidable warrior to appear and face them in a last fated duel.
